products.title: Voile FR Sandshell Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their voile fr fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades. Durable and stylish, this translucent cream electric roller blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream electric roller blind is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. Electric roller blinds are ideal due to their child-safe cordless design, eco-friendly charging options, and can integrate with google home hub and amazon alexa devices, just choose their smart hub when ordering.

products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their exclusive thermoblock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. A cream electric roller blind easily brightens up the space, and their thermoblock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This cream blackout roller has a silver uv-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, a great option for hot offices or sunrooms.

products.title: Dapple Solar Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: This range of fabrics feature an effective reflective treatment to the reverse of the fabric to reduce heat and glare keeping your room pleasant in the height of summer whilst also being effective for privacy. This cream roller blind is ideal for rooms that get a lot of sun as the solar coating will help to reflect the light away from your furnishings. products.title: Eco Friendly FR Cream Recycled Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Ivory Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Versailles blackout ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish. In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window. Crafted with blackout material, it wont allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with pollergen, this neutralises pollen so it doesnt disturb hayfever sufferers.
